Plan Time for the Expo Hall
Tons of great networking, swag and contests here. Make sure you stop by Loggly's Booth #850 near the Developer Lounge.
The Developer Lounge is where you can hang out, connect and chat all things tech with other developers.  Find it at the back of Expo Hall Sands C.
Follow @Loggly on Twitter for live show updates and ways to win swag!
13,500+ attendees, including C-level execs, IT leaders, & developers
If you take a taxi from the airport, tell the driver you want to be taken to your hotel via Swenson Avenue, NOT the airport tunnel.
Breakfast and Lunch if you have a full pass - and snacks at the party on thursday!
Winning Tip: Always Gamble On An Empty Stomach

Read more on this study that examined the counterintuitive hypothesis that hunger improves strategic decision making, arguing that people in a hot state are better able to make favorable decisions involving uncertain outcomes... maybe it will be your winning tip at the black jack table!

• Comfortable shoes
• Business Cards
• Sweatshirt - Vegas is hot, but it's cold inside the casinos!
• Extra phone charger - bonus if it is portable
• Download and set up all your social media apps before you get there - there will be lots of info and pictures you'll want to share!
• Use Evernote's mobile business card scanner feature to quickly and easily upload new contact information before you loose track of the card.
